com.buession.web.servlet

类 AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver
      • com.buession.web.servlet.AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ExceptionHandlerResolver, ServletExceptionHandlerResolver, org.springframework.core.Ordered, org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerExceptionResolver

    public abstract class AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver
implements ServletExceptionHandlerResolver
    作者:
    Yong.Teng
